name: .FTP File Extension
summary: Learn about .FTP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An FTP file contains a site exported from FlashFXP, a Windows FTP client. It stores XML-formatted information about an FTP site configured in FlashFXP. FTP files are used for sharing sites with other users and for backing up sites.

content: FTP files save all the information about a site added in FlashFXP. The information includes the FTP site name, connection type, address, login type, file transfer rules, username, and password.
You can import an FTP file in FlashFXP by selecting Sites â†’ Import Sites..., choosing the "FlashFXP XML (*ftp)" format from the dropdown menu, navigating to the FTP file, and clicking Import.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
